name: Loki Thievery
description:
Loki Thievery is an infinite runner that follows Rubio, Loki's number one thieve.
Make sure you avoid all obstacles and grab as much loot as possible while running away from the guards of Asgard.
Use arrow keys for menu navigation and in game controls: up - jump/swing, down - slide, right - fire.
Alpha version. Work in progress.
